name: pam-diff
description: Measure differences between pixel arrays extracted from pam images

scripts.test: DEBUG=true && npm run gray && npm run rgb && npm run rgba
scripts.examples: DEBUG=true node examples/example && DEBUG=true node examples/example2 && DEBUG=true node examples/example3 && DEBUG=true node examples/example4 && DEBUG=true node examples/example5
scripts.out: DEBUG=true node examples/grayOut && DEBUG=true node examples/rgb24Out
scripts.all: npm test && npm run examples && npm run out
scripts.doc: jsdoc index.js -d docs && git commit -m 'update docs' -- docs
scripts.gray: DEBUG=true node tests/test_gray && DEBUG=true node tests/test_gray2 && DEBUG=true node tests/test_gray3 && DEBUG=true node tests/test_gray4
scripts.rgb: DEBUG=true node tests/test_rgb && DEBUG=true node tests/test_rgb2 && DEBUG=true node tests/test_rgb3 && DEBUG=true node tests/test_rgb4
scripts.rgba: DEBUG=true node tests/test_rgba && DEBUG=true node tests/test_rgba2 && DEBUG=true node tests/test_rgba3 && DEBUG=true node tests/test_rgba4

author: Kevin Godell <kevin.godell@gmail.com>
